content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### No structures have been created yet
As of step 367, no structures have been established on the map. The agent has not placed any entities or constructed any facilities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when retrieving entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are attempting to retrieve exists at the specified location. In step 364, an error occurred when trying to get an offshore pump at position (x=-3.5, y=22.0) because no such entity was found. Double-check the coordinates and ensure the entity has been placed before attempting to interact with it.
